snippet.title: Trade Rivals - Goblin Age Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page Opened! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3420920/Trade_Rivals__Goblin_Age/?beta=0

Trade Rivals: Goblin Age - Official First Gameplay Trailer

Step into the chaotic, goblin-infested world of Trade Rivals: Goblin Age, where cunning merchants clash in a battle of wits, wealth, and strategy! In this medieval-inspired trade simulation game, you'll run your own shop, outsmart your rivals, and aim to become the last trader standing.

This gameplay trailer gives you a first look at:

Shop Management – Stock your shelves with goods, set competitive prices, and attract customers with smart strategies.
Dynamic Market Economy – Watch as market prices shift based on player actions, and adapt to ever-changing supply and demand.
Competitive Multiplayer – Face off against up to three rivals in real-time, vying for dominance in a cutthroat trading landscape.
Bankruptcy & Survival – Avoid financial ruin as you compete to stay in the game. Only the sharpest trader will claim victory!
Follow us to stay updated on new features, release details, and exclusive content. Don’t forget to like, comment, and subscribe to support our journey!

Join the Goblin Age Revolution:
Steam:https://store.steampowered.com/app/3420920/Trade_Rivals__Goblin_Age/
• Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/TradeRivals/
• Twitter: https://x.com/TradeRivalsGA
